subject: Re: [junit] Stack overflow error
msgSnippet: ... Show us the code.  SOEs happen because of an infinite loop. -- Jason Rogers I am crucified with Christ: nevertheless I live; yet not I, but Christ liveth
messageBody:
On Thursday 13 January 2005 05:51, shyam wrote:
> dear group members,
>       I am getting the followin error when i try to
> invoke the suite();
>    unable to invoke
> suite()-java.lang.stackoverflowerror.
> how do i rectify that. if im not incorporating the
> test methods in the suite and not defining the suite
> its working well but i need to put it in a suite.help
> me out.thanks

Show us the code. SOEs happen because of an infinite loop.

--
Jason Rogers

"I am crucified with Christ: nevertheless I live; yet not I,
but Christ liveth in me: and the life which I now live in
the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God, who loved
me, and gave himself for me."
Galatians 2:20
